description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to three times (3x) the daily performance of the NASDAQ Biotechnology Index® (the ""index"").
 The fund invests in financial instruments that ProShare Advisors believes, in combination, should produce daily returns consistent with the fund's investment objective. The index is a modified capitalization weighted index that includes securities of the Nasdaq Stock Market listed companies that are classified as either biotechnology or pharmaceutical. The fund is non-diversified.
